settings.content: Theme settings allow you to customize the look and feel of your shop without having to delve into HTML or CSS code. Please see our [help page on theme settings](http://eclipse-8.myshopify.com/pages/documentation) to learn more about how to customize your store.
In case of any issues with the theme feel free to contact our team at [support@magikcommerce.com](support@magikcommerce.com)
We also offer theme customization services. You can contact our team to discuss estimate.

settings.label: Use Custom Logo?
settings.info: Note: Duplicate logo_green.png and logo_white.png in the /assets folder and customize accordingly.

settings.label: Green Logo
settings.info: Image size must be 4739 x 1032 px.

settings.label: White Logo
settings.info: Image size must be 2048 x 575 px.

settings.content: The default green color code is #50a746.

Content width
settings.info: Select content with in columns. Full website with is 12 columns. If sidebars enabled, content equals 12 - sidebars_width

settings.content: Select color for link text on regular and hover conditions
Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.

settings.label: Currencies you wish to support
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY

settings.content: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.

* For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://wiki.shopify.com/Do_Tell_Where_The_Money_Is) (“Do tell where the money is”).
